user.title: Tautulli Active Streams
user.description:
To find your API key, open the Tautulli webpage and navigate to **Settings** â†’ **Web Interface**. The API key is at the bottom of that page.

**Examples of URL formats:**
- **Local (HTTP)**: `http://192.168.0.10:8181`
- **Remote / Reverse Proxy (HTTPS)**: `https://tautulli.example.com`

data.server_name: Enter a friendly name for your Tautulli server (optional).
data.url: Enter the full URL of your Tautulli server (including port if necessary).
data.verify_ssl: Enable SSL verification? Disable if using a self-signed certificate.

options.title: Tautulli Advanced Setup
options.description: Configure how often to poll Tautulli, how many sensors to create, and whether to enable watch-history statistics.

data.session_interval: How often (in seconds) to refresh active streams? (Default: 4).
data.statistics_interval: How often (in seconds) to refresh watch-history for statistics? (Default: 1800).
data.num_sensors: Number of sensors to create for monitoring active streams.
data.image_proxy: Use Image Proxy? (Proxy images via Home Assistant).

init.title: Tautulli Active Streams Options
init.description: Changes apply seamlessly without a Home Assistant restart.

data.session_interval: API update frequency for active streams (seconds).
data.statistics_interval: API update frequency for watch-history stats (seconds).
data.num_sensors: Maximum number of concurrent stream sensors to display.
data.statistics_days: Number of days to fetch watch-history from Tautulli.

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to Tautulli. Please check your URL, API key, and network connectivity.
